directions: Cook noodles as directed on package. Heat oil on medium heat in a large sauté pan or wok. Cook shrimp until pink, about 5 minutes. Add vegetables and almonds and cook 5 more minutes, stirring frequently. Combine sauce, orange juice and cornstarch in a bowl. Set aside. When shrimp has cooked, add sauce mixture to pan and cook until sauce thickens. Serve hot over udon. Top with scallions and sesame seeds, if desired.
ingredients: 1/2 pound whole-grain udon noodles (or whole-wheat pasta)
1/4 cup sauce used for stir-fry, such as teriyaki, hoisin or soy
title: Easy Veggie-Shrimp Stir-Fry with Udon
